Text.Page:
Craterview Outpost needs lumber to fortify their palisade. There's no lumber to be had from Elenea, and Fanise says we can't cut these trees. "Delicate ecology," and all that.

So here's my plan. You've seen those great arbosks to the southwest, have you not? I couldn't defeat one, but there's a lot of lumber walking around out there, , if you're willing to help me out.

Oh, and watch out for the imps!
This lumber's going to build better defenses, now that we may have to defend against Killian. Not that we could, probably...
It's going to take more lumber than this to build up our palisade.
